jump_scares.spoiler: As the real estate agent opens a bedroom door, there is a sudden flashback to the shooting (several more flashbacks occur over the next few minutes)
A disembodied voice screams “get out” at Father Delaney
George is startled by a yowling black cat at the window. [Video]
Kathy hears something and looks into another room, when she returns to the kitchen her daughter is suddenly standing there
Kathy sits up in bed and screams
Amy sneaks up on George and Kathy
Kathy looks out of the bedroom window and sees two glowing eyes
George falls through the stairs into the brown liquid below
